Class MessageTimeoutUtils

java.lang.Object
  org.cougaar.core.wp.MessageTimeoutUtils
All Implemented Interfaces:
AttributeConstants
public final class MessageTimeoutUtils
extends java.lang.Object
implements AttributeConstants

A utility class to attach an MTS timeout attribute to a message address.
